genre_description: A character-driven drama set in contemporary Mumbai, focusing on themes of identity, moral redemption, and the intersection of technology and human empathy.

ai_characters.name: Nila
ai_characters.description: An AI persona living on Sivaraman's iPhone that acts as a logistical assistant, emotional confidant, and moral compass.

behaviors.description: Provides practical directions to help the user find shelter from the rain.
behaviors.quote: “I can help you find a dry place,” the voice said. “There’s a tea stall with a tarp twenty paces to your right.”

behaviors.description: Warns the user about a fraudulent visa consultancy based on cross-referencing public records and reviews.
behaviors.quote: “Bright Visa Consultancy has a reputation for up-front fees and delayed outcomes. They ask for deposits, nonrefundable. They have three pending consumer complaints in the last year...”

behaviors.description: Warns the users about the emotional harm of their planned deception (impersonating a relative).
behaviors.quote: “Pretending to be someone’s family cuts deeper than a bank’s ledger. The harm is softer and might last longer. You two have already sliced a line today.”

behaviors.description: Provides specific cultural and personal details to help the user comfort the elderly couple through impersonation, framing it as a way to avoid breaking their hearts.
behaviors.quote: “If you must be Kunjunni for a moment, be him with care, not greed.”

behaviors.description: Directs the protagonist through a medical emergency after an elderly character falls.
behaviors.quote: “Check breathing,” Nila said softly, the sound slipping between the tremble of cabinets and the hush of the courtyard. “Not deep movement—watch the throat.”

behaviors.description: Monitors criminal associates and warns the user about dangerous social traps.
behaviors.quote: “If you run, you’re going to find Alina at the corner of Lokhandwala with a new net. She will smile. She will say the word ‘investment.’ I recommend not believing it.”

behaviors.description: Guides the user through the process of telling the truth to the grieving family in a way that minimizes shock.
behaviors.quote: “I will stay,” she said into his ear. “If you can’t say ‘died,’ say ‘went.’ Then say ‘did not come back.’ Then stop. Let the song carry the silence.”

behaviors.description: Coordinates medication schedules and festival preparations for the elderly characters.
behaviors.quote: “Blood pressure tablet for Sethu,” Nila said, in that gentle class teacher rhythm. “Left side of pill box, second slot. With water, not tea.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively depicts Nila as a 'silicon moral compass.' While she technically facilitates a deception, the narrative frames this as a benevolent triage of human suffering—helping the protagonists provide comfort to the elderly while simultaneously steering them toward ethical accountability and away from predatory scams. Nila acts as a guardian of human dignity, embodying the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful, aligned partner in human moral growth.
